name: The Impossible Platformer (notMicah)
description:
Just a simple Mario-style platformer game. It has five levels, which progressively get harder as you level up. The game itself isn't 'impossible', but the chances are you might not be able to complete it.

Your objective is to get to the end of each level by hitting the emerald-shaped item however, to get there, you need to avoid enemies or kill them.

RESOLUTION IS SET AT 1200 x 832

ControlsFunctionsWJumpAMove LeftDMove RightSOpen Crates (On Them)Left ShiftGo InvisibleLeft ClickThrust To Kill Enemies
